mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_RESERVATION (USER_ID, TOUR_ID, PERSON_COUNT, TOTAL_PRICE, RESERVATION_DATE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{tourId}, #{personCount}, #{totalPrice}, #{reservationDate})
mapper.select: SELECT R.*, T.TITLE AS TOUR_TITLE, T.THUMBNAIL_URL AS TOUR_THUMBNAIL FROM T_RESERVATION R JOIN T_TOUR_PRODUCT T ON R.TOUR_ID = T.TOUR_ID WHERE R.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY R.RESERVATION_ID DESC
